name: Ninja vs. Robots
description:
The invading robots have assaulted your village. Destroy 'em!

KEYBOARD

Arrow keys: move ninja

2: Change weapon

3: Equip/Unequip weapon, right hand

1: Equip/Unequip weapon, left hand

E: Use weapon, right hand

W: Use weapon, left hand

A: Jump

S: Capriole

Z: Skew left

X: Skew right

P: Pause

CONTROLLER

This game is compatible with MSI GC20 Game Controller. See the list of keys in the in-game menu section.

TOUCH SCREEN

Touch screen is supported.

This game is also available on Google Play. See below. NOTE: currently is under approval!
